duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing intrusion analysis using SIEM technology, packet captures, reports, data visualization, log analysis and pattern analysis.
Being the first responder to security events and escalations via email, phone, and tickets across corporate user networks, data centers, and cloud environments.
Assisting in remediation of all information security incidents and hunting for and identifying threat actor groups and respective tactics, techniques, and procedures.
Documenting and communicating findings, escalating critical incidents, and interacting with lines of business.
Improving and challenging existing processes and procedures in a very agile and fast-paced cyber security environment. Keeping current on the threat landscape and cyber security trends.

Adapting to fluid infrastructures and learning/supporting new technologies. Being a thought leader around new security alert content creation, data correlation, anomaly thresholds, and logic updates. Being the primary mentor to the core analyst team with regards to training & escalation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent IT/Security industry experience.

Industry recognized professional certification such as (but not limited to): Security+, CBROPS, CSA, CEH, GSEC, SSCP, CISSP, GBFA, GCDA, GCIA, GCIH, GMON, GNFA, GOSI, GPEN, GPPA, GREM, GSOC, OSDA, OSCP.
